text: Allah pabitra grha ka'bake baniyechena manusera jan'ya eka abalanbana, ara pabitra masa, ara utsargakrta pasudera, ara mala- parano utadera. E-saba e'i jan'ya ye tomara yena janate paro -- allah janena ya-kichu ache mahakasamandale o ya-kichu ache prthibite, ara allah saba-kichu sanbandhe sarbajnata.
